name: TaxiMan
description:
Hello, this is my first game in unity, it takes a lot of time i hope you like it ;) (Currently Work In Progress)

Move with W, A, S, D brake with E

Download your better quality (SSAO) and controller support!

Planed Things Depending on users feedback:

  • More maps
  • Options
  • GPS
  • ...and the biggest feature... Multiplayer
